name: At some point in the last few weeks, #Firefox has completely stopped passing keyboard shortcuts through to Google Apps. I can't format text, undo/redo, etc. Seems like a bug somewhere!

content.html: At some point in the last few weeks, #Firefox has completely stopped passing keyboard shortcuts through to Google Apps. I can't format text, undo/redo, etc. Seems like a bug somewhere!

summary: Looks like it was a conflict with the "StopTheMadness" extension, which I've had installed for some time without issue. I didn't notice that there was a problem with the extension because I failed to reload open websites after disabling the extensions. Oops!

content.html: Looks like it was a conflict with the "StopTheMadness" extension, which I've had installed for some time without issue. I didn't notice that there was a problem with the extension because I failed to reload open websites after disabling the extensions. Oops!

summary: There is quite the history of Google changing things in their apps in ways that break things in other browsers. As I understand it, Firefox is contently playing whack-a-mole with these hijinks

summary: Yup. I've updated the original post and sent an additional tweet. Turns out this was an extension doing something silly. Nothing nefarious here 😀
